Room.Name: Cygnus' Cave
Room.ShortDescription: You have entered the dark cave of the great gold dragon, Cygnus.
Room.LongDescription: The cave is strangely dark, depsite the bright sunlight outside. In the shadows, you can see a large creature moving from within. The cave is quite lavish, decorated in gold and jewels. It doesn't look like anyone has entered this area in ages, though.
